subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Biathlon
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin, the defending slalom champion in the Olympics and the world championships, added another World Cup title with a victory in Méribel, France.
snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin, the defending slalom champion in the Olympics and the world championships, added another World Cup title with a victory in Méribel, France.
